title: Is Coding Fundamental?
teaser: Next fall, dozens of school districts nationwide will offer new computer coding classes. Advocates say computer programming is a fundamental […]
description: Next fall, dozens of school districts nationwide will offer new computer coding classes. Advocates say computer programming is a fundamental […]
contentencoded:
Next fall, dozens of school districts nationwide will offer new computer coding classes. Advocates say computer programming is a fundamental kind of literacy, but critics argue the movement is a power play by tech companies who want schools to invest in their products.


Guest: Mona Akmal, a Director of Product for Code.org.
